en.title: Chat System
en.text_note_0: âš ï¸ Your token is only stored in your browser and is not sent to the server
en.text_note_1: ğŸ“ Important Note: For all users to be able to send messages, you must place a shared token in the script.js file (SHARED_TOKEN variable). This token must have gist access and be able to write to the shared Gist.
en.text_note_2: ğŸ’¡ Solution: Create a dedicated token for this chat and place it in the SHARED_TOKEN variable in the script.js file. This way, all users can send messages without needing to enter a token.
